item.title: Concert by Putin ally Gergiev cancelled in Italy
item.description: The Russian conductor has been barred from Western stages since the invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: Kenya U-turn over charging prominent activist with terror offences
item.description: The police had earlier said that Boniface Mwangi would be charged with treason, sparking a huge outcry.

item.title: Bangladesh plane crash: 'I heard an explosion, saw fire'
item.description: A teacher describes the moment he saw a jet crash into the school campus in the capital, Dhaka.

item.title: At least 19 dead after air force jet crashes into Bangladesh school
item.description: The air force says the F-7 jet experienced a mechanical fault after taking off for a training exercise in Dhaka.

item.title: China begins building world's largest dam, fuelling fears in India
item.description: The dam is on a Tibetan river that flows into India and Bangladesh, and could affect millions downstream.
